Package com.vilt.minium

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConditionWebElements<T extends WebElements>  
    CoreWebElements<T extends CoreWebElements<T>>
    The Interface CoreWebElements.
    DefaultWebElements
    The Interface DefaultWebElements.
    FiltersWebElements<T extends WebElements>
    This interface provides useful filter methods for Minium WebElements, like contained text filtering or attribute value filtering.
    JQueryWebElements<T extends WebElements>
    Declares methods that correspond to jQuery transversing functions, as well as attribute functions.
    PositionWebElements<T extends WebElements>
    The Interface PositionWebElements.
    ScrollWebElements
    Makes available javascript functions for element scrolling ( element.scrollIntoView)
    TargetLocatorWebElements<T extends WebElements>
    The Interface TargetLocatorWebElements.
    WaitWebElements<T extends WebElements>
    Provides wait methods for WebElements.
    WebElements
    The Interface WebElements.
    WebElementsDriverProvider<T extends WebElements>
    The Interface WebElementsDriverProvider.
    WebElementsFinder<T extends WebElements>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    The Class Configuration.
    DefaultWebElementsDriver
    The Class DefaultWebElementsDriver.
    Duration
    This class represents a duration with some provided time and unit.
    Minium
    The Class Minium.
    WebElementsDriver<T extends WebElements>  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TimeoutException  
    WebElementsException
    The Class WebElementsException.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Async
    Minium methods that perform some kind of client asynchronous operation must have this annotation.
    JQueryResources
    When extending Minium WebElements, this annotation associates the corresponding javscript files that provide the declared methods implementation.
